messages.message:
`view-my-hub` has been failing in several CI runs because there are fewer or greater Converse projects than expected
• https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11189/overview/287dda2e-eec5-49c8-b9f8-17be3f6b5fdd?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
• https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11194/overview/54f3fedc-d1c5-48bd-83d0-[…]roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1718211041155.4&att=1 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11194/overview/54f3fedc-d1c5-48bd-83d0-fbf37622890c/replay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1718211041155.4&att=1)
i think this is happening when multiple CI runs are running `view-my-hub` at the same time - any thoughts on how to make `view-my-hub` concurrency-safe? @Weiming Wu
I thought that we already fixed this because view-my-hub is making new converse projects with a suffix now
yes in the second link you can see that we are searching for Converse projects with the suffix, but somehow there are 3 instead of 4 matching Converse projects
btw this isn’t consistently failing, it’s an intermittent failure
Maybe I need to track how many Converse projects successfully get created :sweat_smile:
are you actively working on this @Weiming Wu? If not I’m going to skip it in my PR.
Nope, not yet. I'll take a look after lunch
